thread.title: Extended Stay America to Participate at the 2015 Bank of America Merrill Lynch Gaming and Lodging Conference
thread.title_full: Extended Stay America to Participate at the 2015 Bank of America Merrill Lynch Gaming and Lodging Conference

title: Extended Stay America to Participate at the 2015 Bank of America Merrill Lynch Gaming and Lodging Conference
text:
Extended Stay America to Participate at the 2015 Bank of America Merrill Lynch Gaming and Lodging Conference September 01, 2015 04:01 PM   
CHARLOTTE, N.C.- Extended Stay America, Inc. (NYSE:STAY) (the “Company”) today announced that Jonathan Halkyard, Chief Financial Officer, will participate at the 2015 Bank of America Merrill Lynch Gaming and Lodging conference on Wednesday, September 9, 2015 in New York, NY. 
Mr. Halkyard’s remarks will be webcast live at 10:00 AM Eastern Time on Wednesday, September 9, 2015. Investors and other interested persons may listen to the live webcast through the Investor Relations section of Extended Stay’s website at www.aboutSTAY.com . A replay of the webcast will be posted on the Company’s investor relations website; the replay can be accessed for 90 days. 
About Extended Stay America 
Extended Stay America, Inc., the largest owner/operator of company-branded hotels in North America, owns and operates 682 hotels in the U.S. and Canada comprising 76,000 rooms and employs over 9,000 employees at its hotel properties and headquarters. The Company’s core brand, Extended Stay America®, serves the mid-priced extended stay segment. Visit www.extendedstay.com for more information about the Company and its services. Contacts
